Workflow.Name: HELPER - ObjectOperations Gov
Workflow.Description: Used to call the following helper operations from canvas apps to overcome issue in which you cannot call helper flows with Dataverse connectors directly from Canvas. Governance copy because you cant use helpers across solutions

Description.description: Used to call the following helper operations from canvas apps to overcome issue in which you cannot call helper flows with Dataverse connectors directly from Canvas. Governance copy because you cant use helpers across solutions
